roles.jd_responsibilities_en:
• Design, develop, and maintain scalable services and APIs.
• Write unit/integration tests and perform code reviews.
• Deliver outcomes aligned with TECH_FIN objectives.
• Collaborate cross-functionally to support TECH_FIN roadmaps.
• Document processes and contribute to continuous improvement.
• Measure KPIs and report progress to stakeholders.

• Progettare, sviluppare, and maintain scalable services and APIs.
• Write unit/integration tests and perform code reviews.
• Conseguire risultati allineati agli obiettivi TECH_FIN.
• Collaborare in modo interfunzionale per supportare i roadmap TECH_FIN.
• Documentare i processi e contribuire al miglioramento continuo.
• Misurare i KPI e riportare i progressi agli stakeholder.
roles.jd_requirements_en:
• Proficiency in Python/Java/Node.
• Experience with REST/GraphQL APIs.
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience.
• 2+ years in a related role (or equivalent projects).
• Familiarity with KPIs and continuous improvement.
• Proficiency with collaboration tools (Docs, Spreadsheets, Ticketing).

• Padronanza in Python/Java/Node.
• Esperienza with REST/GraphQL APIs.
• Laurea triennale or equivalent experience.
• 2+ anni in a related role (or equivalent projects).
• Familiarità with KPIs and continuous improvement.
• Padronanza with collaboration tools (Docs, Spreadsheets, Ticketing).
